text:
Hi everyone, is it possible to create a custom record id for an object?
please help me out, its urgent

Hi everyone, I am trying to add custom code to a <http://Softr.io|Softr.io> website to track and identify contacts who visit and login to our Softr site. I am using <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/events/tracking-code#:~:text=In%20addition%20to%20tracking%20page,track%20event%20data%20in%20HubSpot.|this document> as a reference, but getting a little stuck on which code to use and implementing it within the Softr site. Let me know if anyone has experience with this. Thanks in advance!

Hi <@U0572Q18XLG>! I hope you are doing well. Can you tell me how to add a background to child menu items? There are no settings as far as I can see in the CMS and likely this needs some coding. From research, I found these resources, but I want this to be a global change and not just page by page. Is that possible?

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Help-with-Dropdown-Menu-Design/m-p/255302>

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Styling-Drop-Down-Menu/m-p/305129>
Here is the example I'd like to add the background too.

I figured it out <@U0572Q18XLG> :grinning:
Take care!
